Text: I completely forgot about the game and even though i already know who won I'd like to at least watch the last quarter. So convenient you have divided it into quarters too. A person could download the first quarter and watch that and the second quarter download would be ready to watch by then. So glad I found this, and in 720p quality too, an added benefit since I don't subscribe to HDTV. Thanks so much for going to the trouble and sharing!
Seed to a ratio of 1:1?  Small price to pay.  I'm already at 6:1, these games are so popular.  Thank you very much for the upload.
